archimate:DataObject.name: ServiceBundleSpec
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A ServiceBundleSpec is the base class for defining the different classes of bundled ResourceFacingServiceSpecs. Conceptually; a ServiceBundleSpec is thought of as a collection to enable the needs of different sets of ResourceFacingServiceSpecs to be grouped together. The bundle conveys the concept of grouped ServiceSpecs that are related. Since these are ResoureFacingSpecifications; they define reusable templates for implementing the ResourceFacingServices that are required by a particular CustomerFacingService (as represented by a ServicePackage). Therefore; a ServiceBundleSpec templatizes the shared characteristics of this service bundling.
